abstract: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store adopted a shareholder rights plan after an activist investor moved to shake up the board and gain a major stake in the restaurant and retailer.
snippet: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store adopted a shareholder rights plan after an activist investor moved to shake up the board and gain a major stake in the restaurant and retailer.
lead_paragraph: 12:11 p.m. | Updated Cracker Barrel Old Country Store said on Friday that it had adopted a shareholder rights plan, or a poison pill, after an activist investor moved to shake up the board and gain a major stake in the restaurant and retailer.
